definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: row or layer, course (Targum NH id.; NH also [[מִדְבָּךְ]] id. (Levy:NHWB iii. 23), cf. madma0kun as loan-word Frä:12; borrowed from As. nadbaku, mountain-slope acc. to Dl:Pr 150 (cf. Ba:ZA ii. 115 f. Hpt:GN 1883, 96; BAS i. 8.15), but mng. not very suitable Nö:ZMG xi (1886), 733 Mey:Entst. J. 46);—abs. ´[[נ]]: Ezr 6:4, pl. [[נִדְבָּכִין]] v:Ezr 6:4.
